name: Photo Finish LIVE
reason: The Gold Standard of GameFi. Generates massive real USDC revenue. A sustainable, closed-loop digital economy.

name: Aurory
reason: One of the few playable games on Solana. High production value, though tokenomics struggle with emission pressure.

name: Star Atlas
reason: Infinite inflation utility token. The game is ambitious but the token supply is endless. High dilution risk.

name: Star Atlas DAO
reason: Governance token for a game still in alpha. Heavy VC bag-holder presence.

name: STEPN
reason: The poster child for unsustainable 'Earn' mechanics. Paying people to walk is not production; it is subsidies.

name: Shrapnel
reason: High-fidelity shooter with high-fidelity unlocking schedules. Heavy investor pressure.

name: Access Protocol
reason: Content monetization layer with nearly 100% inflation rates in early years to pay creators. Dilution engine.

name: Genopets
reason: Gamified fitness. Better economic controls than STEPN, but still relies on emissions to sustain interest.

name: Guacamole
reason: Consumer rewards app. Community-driven distribution. Functions more like loyalty points than a VC dump.
